refnamediv.refpurpose: Questions whether the argument is a infinite number

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the number of times the argument is not a number, with the sign of the first infinity.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the qinf opcode. It uses the file qinf.csd.
Example of the qinf opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
